channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Chasing yield’ was an inside joke at SVB—until it led to the bank’s collapse
item.description: Back in 2011, some of the bank leaders were involved in running jokes about chasing yield—now they don't seem so funny.

item.title: Ladakh’s Local Hero Wants India to Pay Attention to His People
item.description: The activist Sonam Wangchuk is leading protests to demand more autonomy for India’s remote Ladakh region, which shares borders with China and Pakistan...

item.title: Why ‘Saturday Night’ Omits the Influence of Carol Burnett
item.description: A new film about the show doesn’t mention her. But in many ways her hit sketch series helped define the early vision of Lorne Michaels.

item.title: Musk declares ‘science fiction without the fiction’ after giant SpaceX booster lands on launch pad
item.description: SpaceX has been recovering boosters of its Falcon 9 rockets for years, but they land on ocean platforms or on concrete slabs miles from their launch p...

item.title: Alex Salmond, Scotland’s Former First Minister, Dies at 69
item.description: Mr. Salmond led the Scottish National Party twice, guiding it from a fringe political group into a powerful electoral force in Britain.

item.title: Israeli Jets Pummel Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon
item.description: Sirens sounded in northern Israel, warning of incoming fire from Hezbollah.

item.title: When Trump Rants, This Is What I Hear
item.description: His hostility has taught me more about myself.

item.title: Map: 6.2-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Costa Rica
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: I tried virtual reality yoga on Meta’s $500 headset. It was a glimpse into the future of workouts
item.description: Alo Moves has introduced mini-instructors which means that you can see a pose from all angles and tweak your own form to match.

item.description: The best team take a break this week.
